node.title: Reactive Extensions (Rx) - Part 8 - Timeouts
node.description: Should you use Reactive Extensions (Rx) to do timeouts in .NET? It turns out it's better to use CancellationTokenSource in the Task Parallel Library (TPL).

node.title: Reactive Extensions (Rx) - Part 6 - Task ToObservable
node.description: How and where to use the Reactive Extensions (Rx) ToObservable Extension method to turn a Task Parallel Library (TPL) Task into an IObservable.

node.title: Reactive Extensions (Rx) - Part 5 - Awaiting Observables
node.description: How and where to use Task Parallel Library (TPL) async and await with Reactive Extensions (Rx). Also, how to use TPL for awaiting observables.

node.title: ConfigureAwait in Task Parallel Library (TPL)
node.description: The importance of using ConfigureAwait when using the Task Parallel Library (TPL) to improve performance and reduce context switching.
